IN case oF accipent: Maryland law requires the operator of a
vehicle involved in an accident to stop immediately and remain at
the scene of the accident until the following requirements have been
fulfilled: (1) Render assistance to any person injured; (2) Give his

name and address and the registration number of the vehicle he is v T e B ‘ :
driving; and (3) Upon request, exhibit his driver’s license to the o - J A ,
person struck or the person attending any vehicles involved in the . 8 : S ] : L
collision. ; 3 = ' | '

manner involved in an accident within this State in which any ) / , ] R
